amendment.description: Amendment prohibits further Export-Import Bank subsidies of transactions involving Russian firms if Russia transfers either the SS-N-26 Sunburn missile or the SS-N-26 Yakhont missile to China.
amendment.purpose: An amenment to probhit Export-Import Bank subsidies fo exports to Russia if Russia transfers certain missile systems to China.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Solomon amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
